rows.label: bf04120150_0010
rows.name:
Well, we took it by force.
Just like you wanted us to.

rows.label: bf04120150_0020
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: bf04120150_0030
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf04120150_0050
rows.name: ...Jeez, you're all barely ten yours old.

rows.label: bf04120150_0060
rows.name: Why are you stealing from people?

rows.label: bf04120150_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf04120150_0080
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf04120150_0090
rows.name: Look, keeping your traps shut won't help anyone.

rows.label: bf04120150_0100
rows.name: My lady, be a little more gentle...

rows.label: bf04120150_0110
rows.name: Why? They're only petty thieves.

rows.label: bf04120150_0120
rows.name: Be that as it may, they are still children...

rows.label: bf04120150_0130
rows.name:
Look, I'm sure there's a reason you're
doing all this. Are you just that hard up?

rows.label: bf04120150_0140
rows.name:
What do you take us for?!
We're not some poor beggars!

rows.label: bf04120150_0150
rows.name: Okay, so it's not money you're after...

rows.label: bf04120150_0160
rows.name: Then what the hell is it they want?

rows.label: bf04120150_0170
rows.name:
You should just tell everything.
Boss not hurt you.

rows.label: bf04120150_0180
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf04120150_0190
rows.name: Come on.

rows.label: bf04120150_0200
rows.name: ...We want revenge.

rows.label: bf04120150_0210
rows.name: Revenge?

rows.label: bf04120150_0220
rows.name: We're gonna avenge our village!

rows.label: bf04120150_0230
rows.name:
You don't mean... You were planning
to awaken this Blade and use it?

rows.label: bf04120150_0240
rows.name:
Why don't you tell us the whole story?
We might be able to help.

rows.label: bf04120150_0250
rows.name: Bandits attacked your village...?

rows.label: bf04120150_0260
rows.name:
It was just a small, peaceful village. But the bad men...
Just because we had water, they...

rows.label: bf04120150_0270
rows.name:
Did anyone survive?
Don't tell me...you're the only ones?

rows.label: bf04120150_0280
rows.name: What's your name?

rows.label: bf04120150_0290
rows.name: Mine? Or the village?

rows.label: bf04120150_0300
rows.name: Both.

rows.label: bf04120150_0310
rows.name:
...It's Ririo.
From Cordell Village.

rows.label: bf04120150_0320
rows.name:
Cordell Village...
Can't say I've heard of it.

rows.label: bf04120150_0330
rows.name:
It's just a tiny village on the outskirts
of Gula. Not many people know it.

rows.label: bf04120150_0340
rows.name:
Okay, Ririo. I get why you did this.
But still, it's not right to steal from people.

rows.label: bf04120150_0350
rows.name: Besides which, awakening a Blade is dangerous.

rows.label: bf04120150_0360
rows.name: Do you know what happens if it fails?

rows.label: bf04120150_0370
rows.name: You never know until you try!

rows.label: bf04120150_0380
rows.name: Long as one of us manages it, that's all that matters.

rows.label: bf04120150_0390
rows.name: Sounds like you really were desperate, my boy.

rows.label: bf04120150_0400
rows.name: I assume you know the whereabouts of these bandits?

rows.label: bf04120150_0410
rows.name:
There's a big cave over on Twin Trunks Hill.
They use it as a hideout.

rows.label: bf04120150_0420
rows.name:
Oh! Ririo! It's awful!
Those scum are gonna-!

rows.label: bf04120150_0430
rows.name: ...Who are they?

rows.label: bf04120150_0440
rows.name:
Don't worry about them.
What's the matter?

rows.label: bf04120150_0450
rows.name:
R-right,okay... The bandits are
planning to attack Torigo!

rows.label: bf04120150_0460
rows.name: Are you sure?

rows.label: bf04120150_0470
rows.name:
Yeah. We overheard one of their men
talking about it in the city just now.

rows.label: bf04120150_0480
rows.name: And it was definitely one of them?

rows.label: bf04120150_0490
rows.name:
It looked like they were
scouting the place out.

rows.label: bf04120150_0500
rows.name:
They were saying with the consul gone, now's
the perfect chance to take advantage.

rows.label: bf04120150_0510
rows.name:
A shrewd observation... This would indeed
be the perfect time to mount an attack.

rows.label: bf04120150_0520
rows.name:
Are you trying to tell me that idiot consul
was actually good for something?

rows.label: bf04120150_0530
rows.name: So...this all our fault?

rows.label: bf04120150_0540
rows.name:
Well...
Yeah, I guess we might have been the trigger.

rows.label: bf04120150_0550
rows.name: We can't sit by and let this happen.

rows.label: bf04120150_0560
rows.name: Agreed.

rows.label: bf04120150_0570
rows.name:
Right, you lot! You can leave
those nasty bandits to us.

rows.label: bf04120150_0580
rows.name: Wh-what?!

rows.label: bf04120150_0590
rows.name: I swear. We'll avenge your village.

rows.label: bf04120150_0600
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf04120150_0610
rows.name: Name's Rex.

rows.label: bf04120150_0620
rows.name: Take the others and go warn the city guard.

rows.label: bf04120150_0630
rows.name: Warn them about the bandits?

rows.label: bf04120150_0640
rows.name:
Nah, they probably wouldn't believe
you if you said bandits were coming.

rows.label: bf04120150_0650
rows.name: So tell them about us instead.

rows.label: bf04120150_0660
rows.name:
Tell them the guys who destroyed the water
tower are hiding out at Twin Trunks Hill.

rows.label: bf04120150_0670
rows.name: If you say so...but why?

rows.label: bf04120150_0680
rows.name:
Don't worry, you'll see.
We're counting on you,okay?

rows.label: bf04120150_0690
rows.name: Okay.
